meanings.definition: To clean or etch a surface using a blast of sand or other abrasive material.
meanings.sent1: The worker sandblasts the old paint off the metal.
meanings.sent2: He sandblasts the walls to remove the graffiti.
meanings.sent3: The sandblasts danced across the surface, leaving it spotless.
meanings.sent4: The force of the sandblasts transformed the rough stone into a smooth sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the sandblasts echoed in the empty room.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning or etching a surface using a blast of sand or other abrasive material.
meanings.sent1: The sandblasts created a cloud of dust in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: After the sandblasts, the surface was perfectly clean.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the sandblasts scattered on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The sandblasts of time slowly erode the ancient monument.
meanings.sent5: The powerful sandblasts revealed the intricate details of the metalwork.
